meanings.definition: To persist in a belief or course of action.
meanings.sent1: She would insister on going to the park every day.
meanings.sent2: He insisters on finishing his homework before playing.
meanings.sent3: The cat insistered on sitting in the sunbeam all afternoon.
meanings.sent4: The tree insistered on growing tall despite the harsh weather.
meanings.sent5: The determined ant insistered on carrying the heavy leaf back to its nest.

meanings.sent1: My mom is an insister when it comes to eating vegetables.
meanings.sent2: The insister at the store refused to give a refund without a receipt.
meanings.sent3: The insister at the party kept insisting on playing charades.
meanings.sent4: The insister in the group always makes sure everyone follows the rules.
meanings.sent5: The insister in the debate club never backs down from an argument.
